description: plate of the type known as Gustavus Adolphus; in the center a medallion with equestrian figure of Gustavus Adolphus, champion of protestant cause in Thirty Years War; in six medallions around border are represented similar equestrian figures associated with his exploits
markings: at lower right of central medallion a touch in the form of a shield with an <O> and other indistinguishable details
title: "Gustavus Adolphus" plate
